name: Pure Heart
description:
DESCRIPTION
Yuki is an average girl who's chosen to prevent an invasion on Earth from an alien race known as the Lementians. Explore and learn about the planet of Lement as you progress. Fight intense battles and solve puzzles to defeat the corrupt King in this short action RPG.

  • Around 45 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay
  • Unique battle system that requires you to constantly dodge attacks and figure out a strategy to defeat your enemy
  • Small puzzles to advance to the next map, with one large dungeon that utilizes the techniques you learned
  • Optional cutscenes that expands the story, with an optional boss battle if you watch them all

This was a solo project made in less than 2 weeks for the Beginners Circle Jam.
